1.0.name: wordpress/galaxy
1.0.description: Galaxy is a professional WordPress theme which is perfect for corporate business websites and blogs. It features a modern design, post excerpts with thumbnails, header, background, fixed-width, widget-ready and threaded comments. Galaxy theme also comes with custom Menus support and other cool features. Tested with major browsers - Mozilla Firefox, Internet Explorer, Opera, Safari and Chrome. Check Galaxy Official Page in case you need directions.
